explains: adj. 印度尼西亚的；印度尼西亚人的；印度尼西亚语的
n. 印尼人；印尼语群；印度尼西亚语

sentences.en: I hope this will reinforce Indonesian determination to deal with this kind of threat.
sentences.cn: 我希望这会加强印度尼西亚对付这类威胁的决心。

sentences.en: For example, Pithecanthropus erectus is depicted in an Indonesian museum with Malay facial features, because this corresponds to public perceptions.
sentences.cn: 例如，在印度尼西亚的一个博物馆里，直立猿人被描绘成具有马来人的面部特征，因为这符合公众的认知。

sentences.en: The announcement follows in principle the agreement reached on the opening of the consulate between Australian Prime Minister and Indonesian President in Bali last month.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚总理和印尼总统上个月在巴厘岛就开设领事馆达成了协议，公告跟这个协议原则上是一致的。
